title: Sajith meets UNICEF reps in Colombo
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Representative of Sri Lanka to the United Nations International Children’s Fund (UNICEF) Christian Skoog and Deputy Representative of Sri Lanka to the UNICEF Emma Brigham visited the Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa on Friday (20) at the Office of the Leader of the Opposition in Colombo.
A discussion was held about the problems faced by children due to the current crisis and the Leader of the Opposition requested the delegation to provide necessary support for rebuilding Sri Lanka.
Sri Lanka Football reveals 3-year plan with Qatar Football Association
